cause.description:
This cause is devoted to respecting the sovereignty and independence of Lebanon! Lebanon should first be free from the Syrian hegemony and dictatorship. Nobody in Lebanon, except the true and democratic government, should be funded by foreign nations.
1. A Free, Sovereign, Independent, and Democratic Lebanon
2. The removal of all Syrian influence over Lebanon and any other foreign control in the nation
3. To support the current democratically-elected government
4. To support peace, unity, freedom, and security in Lebanon
5. To support cooperation and unity among the various people of Lebanon
6. To support cooperation with other nations in the region and throughout the world
7. To support the work of the United Nations, and to abide by its rules.
8. To ensure the entire support of the Lebanese Army, the disarmament of all militias in Lebanon, and the erradication of terrorists throughout the country
9. All nations in the world must respect the international borders of Lebanon, including the region of the Shebaa Farms
cause.mission: To free Lebanon from all foreign powers!
cause.name: A Free Lebanon
